New Records: De'Aaron Fox scored 49 points against the Utah Jazz
Key Match Events: Kyle Filipowski showed a massive care factor in defensive moments and was able to keep up with De'Aaron Fox, forcing him to miss both shots he attempted against him
Post-Match Reflections: Collin Sexton had a positive spin on the long and frustrating game, saying it was a time for the team to come together and recenter
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game lasted 2 hours and 35 minutes, with the final two minutes lasting more than 20 minutes of real time due to challenges, reviews, and stoppages
Others: The officiating was a point of frustration for both teams, with the Kings players visibly upset throughout the game and the Jazz players discussing it after the game
